sentences.sContent: If the interruption cause is water flow system trouble, do not usewater right after supply resumption but keep it running around 2 minutes andmake sure water quality is acceptable.
sentences.sContent_eng: If the interruption cause is water flow system trouble, do not usewater right after supply resumption but keep it running around 2 minutes andmake sure water quality is acceptable.
sentences.sCn: 如因供水管路故障导致的停水，在供水恢复后，应打开水龙头放水2分钟左右，经确认水质合格后，方可使用。

synos.tran: 恢复；重新开始；取回；重获；恢复硬币支付

words.tran: [管理] 履历；个人简历；摘要

trans.tranOther: the act of starting an activity again after stopping or being interrupted
